attributes.action: move the Territorial Army out of Herford
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I am setting up this petition to move the TA out of Hereford because it would be safer and mean they could operate more efficiently. It would benefit everyone to see the TA moved out of Hereford. THis would also benefit the security of the country.

At the moment the site attracts the wrong element of people and it would be good to see this removed from the area. 

It would better for both the area and the Territorial Army if a new location was found
